sourcesContent:
<template>
  
</template>

<script>
import { cartItems } from '../fake-data';

export default{
    name: 'CartPage',
    data() {
        return {
            cartItems
        }
    },
    computed: {
        totalPrice() {
            return this.cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + Number(item.price), 0);
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  h1 {
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: 16px;
    padding: 16px;
  }

  #total-price {
    padding: 16px;
    text-align: right;
  }

  #checkout-button {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .product-container {
    align-content: 'center';
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
    display: flex;
    padding: 16px;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .product-image {
    flex: 1;
    height: 100px;
    max-width: 100px;
  }

  .details-wrap {
    padding: 0 16px;
    flex: 3;
  }

  .remove-button {
    flex: 1;
    margin: auto;
  }
</style>
